神经网络案例展示 ​

1 题目： ​

其中：

  • l1 和 l2 为 inputs

  • wi 和 bi 为 weights

  • o1 和 o2 为 outputs

  • o1 的label 为 0.01，o2 的 label 为 0.99

  • 损失函数我们使用MSELoss：

  • 我们的优化目标为：

2 前向传播过程(feedforward) ​

2.1 第一层求解 ​

  • 线性变换

neth1=w1×l1+w2×l2+b1∗1net_{h 1}=w_{1} \times l_{1}+w_{2} \times l_{2}+b_{1} * 1 net​h1​​=w​1​​×l​1​​+w​2​​×l​2​​+b​1​​∗1

neth1=0.1×5+0.15×10+0.35×1=2.35net_{h1} = 0.1 \times 5 + 0.15 \times 10 + 0.35 \times 1 = 2.35 net​h1​​=0.1×5+0.15×10+0.35×1=2.35

  • 非线性变换(激活函数)

outh1=11+e−neth1=11+e−2.35=0.912934out_{h 1}=\frac{1}{1+e^{-net_{h1}}}=\frac{1}{1+e^{-2.35}}=0.912934 out​h1​​=​1+e​−net​h1​​​​​​1​​=​1+e​−2.35​​​​1​​=0.912934

  • 同理可得：

outh2=0.979164out_{h2} = 0.979164 out​h2​​=0.979164

outh3=0.995275out_{h3} = 0.995275 out​h3​​=0.995275

2.2 第二层计算 ​

  • 线性变换

neto1=w7×outh1+w9×outh2+w11×outh3+b2×1net_{o1}=w_{7} \times out_{h1} + w_{9} \times out_{h2} + w_{11} \times out_{h3} + b_{2} \times 1 net​o1​​=w​7​​×out​h1​​+w​9​​×out​h2​​+w​11​​×out​h3​​+b​2​​×1

neto1=0.4×0.912934+0.5×0.979164+0.6×0.995275=2.1019206net_{o1}=0.4 \times 0.912934+0.5 \times 0.979164+0.6 \times 0.995275=2.1019206 net​o1​​=0.4×0.912934+0.5×0.979164+0.6×0.995275=2.1019206

  • 分析性变换(激活函数)

outo1=11+e−neto1=11+e−2.1019206=0.891090out_{o1}=\frac{1}{1+e^{-net_{o1}}}=\frac{1}{1+e^{-2.1019206}}=0.891090 out​o1​​=​1+e​−net​o1​​​​​​1​​=​1+e​−2.1019206​​​​1​​=0.891090

  • 同理可得：

outo2=0.904330out_{o2} = 0.904330 out​o2​​=0.904330

  • 总误差为：

Etotal=Eo1+Eo2=12(0.01−0.891090)2+12(0.99−0.904330)2=0.391829E_{total}=E_{o1}+E_{o2}=\frac{1}{2}(0.01-0.891090)^{2}+\frac{1}{2}(0.99-0.904330)^{2}=0.391829 E​total​​=E​o1​​+E​o2​​=​2​​1​​(0.01−0.891090)​2​​+​2​​1​​(0.99−0.904330)​2​​=0.391829

3 反向传播过程(back propagation) ​

3.1 末层权重梯度计算 ​

  • 以 w7w_{7}w​7​​ 梯度计算为例：

3.1.1 计算流程概述 ​

  • 前向过程为：

       outh1out_{h1}out​h1​​ --> 线性连接 --> neto1net_{o1}net​o1​​ --> 激活 --> outo1out_{o1}out​o1​​ --> MSELoss --> EtotalE_{total}E​total​​

  • 反向过程为：

∂Etotal∂w7=∂Etotal∂outo1×∂outo1∂neto1×∂neto1∂w7\frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial w_{7}} = \frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial out_{o1}} \times \frac{\partial out_{o1}}{\partial net_{o1}} \times \frac{\partial net_{o1}}{\partial w_{7}} ​∂w​7​​​​∂E​total​​​​=​∂out​o1​​​​∂E​total​​​​×​∂net​o1​​​​∂out​o1​​​​×​∂w​7​​​​∂net​o1​​​​

∂Etotal∂w7=−(target−outo1)×outo1×(1−outo1)×outh1\frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial w_{7}} = -(target - out_{o1}) \times out_{o1} \times (1-out_{o1}) \times out_{h1} ​∂w​7​​​​∂E​total​​​​=−(target−out​o1​​)×out​o1​​×(1−out​o1​​)×out​h1​​

3.1.2 具体计算过程 ​

  • 误差对 outo1out_{o1}out​o1​​ 的梯度计算

Eo1=12(targeto1−outo1)2E_{o1}=\frac{1}{2}(target_{o1}-out_{o1})^{2} E​o1​​=​2​​1​​(target​o1​​−out​o1​​)​2​​

Etotal=Eo1+Eo2E_{total}=E_{o1}+E_{o2} E​total​​=E​o1​​+E​o2​​

∂Etotal∂outo1=2×12(targeto1−outo1)2−1∗−1+0=−(0.01−0.891090)=0.88109\frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial out_{o1}}=2 \times \frac{1}{2}(target_{o1}-out_{o1})^{2-1} *-1+0=-(0.01-0.891090)=0.88109 ​∂out​o1​​​​∂E​total​​​​=2×​2​​1​​(target​o1​​−out​o1​​)​2−1​​∗−1+0=−(0.01−0.891090)=0.88109

  • 激活函数导数计算

outo1=11+e−neto1out_{o1}=\frac{1}{1+e^{-net_{o1}}} out​o1​​=​1+e​−net​o1​​​​​​1​​

outo1′=e−net(1+e−net)2=1+e−net−1(1+e−net)2=11+e−net−1(1+e−net)2=outo1(1−outo1)out_{o1}^{\prime}=\frac{e^{-net}}{(1+e^{-net})^{2}} = \frac{1+e^{-net}-1}{(1+e^{-net})^{2}} = \frac{1}{1+e^{-net}}-\frac{1}{(1+e^{-net})^{2}} = out_{o1}(1-out_{o1}) out​o1​′​​=​(1+e​−net​​)​2​​​​e​−net​​​​=​(1+e​−net​​)​2​​​​1+e​−net​​−1​​=​1+e​−net​​​​1​​−​(1+e​−net​​)​2​​​​1​​=out​o1​​(1−out​o1​​)

∂outo1∂neto1=outo1(1−outo1)=0.891090(0.01−0.891090)=0.097049\frac{\partial out_{o1}}{\partial net_{o1}}=out_{o1}(1-out_{o1})=0.891090(0.01-0.891090)=0.097049 ​∂net​o1​​​​∂out​o1​​​​=out​o1​​(1−out​o1​​)=0.891090(0.01−0.891090)=0.097049

  • 线性项导数计算

neto1=w7×outh1+w9×outh2+w11×outh3+b2∗1net_{o1}=w_{7} \times out_{h1}+w_{9} \times out_{h2}+w_{11} \times out_{h3}+b_{2} * 1 net​o1​​=w​7​​×out​h1​​+w​9​​×out​h2​​+w​11​​×out​h3​​+b​2​​∗1

∂neto1∂w7=1×outh1+0+0+0=0.912934\frac{\partial net_{o1}}{\partial w_{7}}=1 \times out_{h1} + 0 + 0 + 0=0.912934 ​∂w​7​​​​∂net​o1​​​​=1×out​h1​​+0+0+0=0.912934

  • 链式求导：

∂Etotal∂w7=0.88109∗0.097049∗0.912934=0.078064\frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial w_{7}} = 0.88109 * 0.097049 * 0.912934 = 0.078064 ​∂w​7​​​​∂E​total​​​​=0.88109∗0.097049∗0.912934=0.078064

  • 同理可求得 w_{8}、 w_{9}、 w_{10}、 w_{11}、 w_{12} 的梯度

3.2 前一层权重梯度计算（以 w1w_1w​1​​ 梯度计算为例） ​

  • 核心公式

∂Etotal∂w1=∂Etotal∂outh1×∂outh1∂neth1×∂neth1∂w1=(∂Eo1∂outh1+∂Eo2∂outh1)×∂outh1∂neth1×∂neth1∂w1\frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial w_{1}} = \frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial out_{h1}} \times \frac{\partial out_{h1}}{\partial net_{h1}} \times \frac{\partial net_{h1}}{\partial w_{1}} = (\frac{\partial E_{o1}}{\partial out_{h1}} + \frac{\partial E_{o2}}{\partial out_{h1}}) \times \frac{\partial out_{h1}}{\partial net_{h1}} \times \frac{\partial net_{h1}}{\partial w_{1}} ​∂w​1​​​​∂E​total​​​​=​∂out​h1​​​​∂E​total​​​​×​∂net​h1​​​​∂out​h1​​​​×​∂w​1​​​​∂net​h1​​​​=(​∂out​h1​​​​∂E​o1​​​​+​∂out​h1​​​​∂E​o2​​​​)×​∂net​h1​​​​∂out​h1​​​​×​∂w​1​​​​∂net​h1​​​​

  • 其中：

∂Eo1∂outh1=∂Eo1∂outo1×∂outo1∂neto1×∂neto1∂outh1=−(targeto1−outo1)×outo1×(1−outo1)×w7\frac{\partial E_{o1}}{\partial out_{h1}} = \frac{\partial E_{o1}}{\partial out_{o1}} \times \frac{\partial out_{o1}}{\partial net_{o1}} \times \frac{\partial net_{o1}}{\partial out_{h1}}=-(target_{o1} - out_{o1}) \times out_{o1} \times (1-out_{o1}) \times w_{7} ​∂out​h1​​​​∂E​o1​​​​=​∂out​o1​​​​∂E​o1​​​​×​∂net​o1​​​​∂out​o1​​​​×​∂out​h1​​​​∂net​o1​​​​=−(target​o1​​−out​o1​​)×out​o1​​×(1−out​o1​​)×w​7​​

∂Eo2∂outh1=∂Eo2∂outo2×∂outo2∂neto2×∂neto2∂outh1=−(targeto2−outo2)×outo2×(1−outo2)×w8\frac{\partial E_{o2}}{\partial out_{h1}} = \frac{\partial E_{o2}}{\partial out_{o2}} \times \frac{\partial out_{o2}}{\partial net_{o2}} \times \frac{\partial net_{o2}}{\partial out_{h1}}=-(target_{o2} - out_{o2}) \times out_{o2} \times (1-out_{o2}) \times w_{8} ​∂out​h1​​​​∂E​o2​​​​=​∂out​o2​​​​∂E​o2​​​​×​∂net​o2​​​​∂out​o2​​​​×​∂out​h1​​​​∂net​o2​​​​=−(target​o2​​−out​o2​​)×out​o2​​×(1−out​o2​​)×w​8​​

  • 带入数据：

∂Eo1∂outh1=−(0.01−0.891090)×0.891090×(1−0.891090)×0.360968=0.030866\frac{\partial E_{o1}}{\partial out_{h1}} = -(0.01-0.891090) \times 0.891090 \times (1-0.891090) \times 0.360968=0.030866 ​∂out​h1​​​​∂E​o1​​​​=−(0.01−0.891090)×0.891090×(1−0.891090)×0.360968=0.030866

  • 同理可求的 ∂Eo2∂outh1\frac{\partial E_{o2}}{\partial out_{h1}}​∂out​h1​​​​∂E​o2​​​​, 于是可得到：

∂Etotal∂w1=0.011204\frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial w_{1}} = 0.011204 ​∂w​1​​​​∂E​total​​​​=0.011204

  • 同理可求得 w_{2}、 w_{3}、 w_{4}、 w_{5}、 w_{6} 的梯度。

4 权重更新 ​

  • 更新 w7w_{7}w​7​​:

w7+=w7+Δw7=w7−η∂Etotal∂w7=0.4−0.5∗0.078064=0.360968w_{7}^{+}=w_{7}+\Delta w_{7}=w_{7}-\eta \frac{\partial E_{total}}{\partial w_{7}}=0.4-0.5 * 0.078064=0.360968 w​7​+​​=w​7​​+Δw​7​​=w​7​​−η​∂w​7​​​​∂E​total​​​​=0.4−0.5∗0.078064=0.360968

  • 同理可得：

w1+=0.094534   w2+=0.0139069   w3+=0.198211w_{1}^{+} = 0.094534 \space\space\ w_{2}^{+} = 0.0139069 \space\space\ w_{3}^{+} = 0.198211 w​1​+​​=0.094534   w​2​+​​=0.0139069   w​3​+​​=0.198211

w4+=0.246422   w5+=0.299497   w6+=0.348993w_{4}^{+} = 0.246422 \space\space\ w_{5}^{+} = 0.299497 \space\space\ w_{6}^{+} = 0.348993 w​4​+​​=0.246422   w​5​+​​=0.299497   w​6​+​​=0.348993

w7+=0.360968   w8+=0.453383   w9+=0.458137w_{7}^{+} = 0.360968 \space\space\ w_{8}^{+} = 0.453383 \space\space\ w_{9}^{+} = 0.458137 w​7​+​​=0.360968   w​8​+​​=0.453383   w​9​+​​=0.458137

w10+=0.553629   w11+=0.557448   w12+=0.653688w_{10}^{+} = 0.553629 \space\space\ w_{11}^{+} = 0.557448 \space\space\ w_{12}^{+} = 0.653688 w​10​+​​=0.553629   w​11​+​​=0.557448   w​12​+​​=0.653688

b1=0.35   b2=0.65  b_{1} = 0.35 \space\space\ b_{2} = 0.65 \space\space b​1​​=0.35   b​2​​=0.65  

5 迭代训练 ​

  • 第10次迭代结果：

O=(0.662866,0.908195)O=(0.662866, 0.908195) O=(0.662866,0.908195)

  • 第100次迭代结果：

O=(0.073889,0.945864)O=(0.073889, 0.945864) O=(0.073889,0.945864)

  • 第1000次迭代结果：

O=(0.022971,0.977675)O=(0.022971, 0.977675) O=(0.022971,0.977675)

  • 1000次时对应的权重为：

w1000=(0.214925,0.379850,0.262855,0.375711,0.323201,0.396402,−1.48972,0.941715,−1.50182,1.049019,1.511881)w^{1000} = (0.214925, 0.379850, 0.262855, 0.375711, 0.323201, 0.396402, -1.48972, 0.941715, -1.50182, 1.049019, 1.511881) w​1000​​=(0.214925,0.379850,0.262855,0.375711,0.323201,0.396402,−1.48972,0.941715,−1.50182,1.049019,1.511881)

思考：不同的训练参数，最后的权重 和 O 趋于一致吗 ？？？

6 将前馈网络写成矩阵形式 ​

  • 第一层：

  • 第二层：

7 代码展示 ​

python
'''
如果 X W 两个矩阵：
W[n,k] @ X[k,m] = Y[n,m] # 
则: dW = dY @ XT; dX = WT @ dY #  矩阵反向传播公式
output = a + b 
'''
import numpy as np

def bp_demo():
    def sigmoid(input):
        return 1 / (1 + np.e**(-input))
    
    def sigmoid_backward(out):
        return out*(1- out)
    
    w1 = np.array([[0.1, 0.15], [0.2, 0.25], [0.3, 0.35]])
    w2 = np.array([[0.4, 0.45, 0.5], [0.55, 0.6, 0.65]])
    b1 = 0.35    
    b2 = 0.65
    input = np.array([5, 10]).reshape(2, 1)
    label = np.array([0.01, 0.99]).reshape(2, 1)
    
    for i in range(100):
        net_h = w1 @ input + b1
        out_h = sigmoid(net_h)
                
        net_o = w2 @ out_h + b2
        out_o = sigmoid(net_o)
        
        loss = np.sum((out_o - label)**2)
        print(loss)
    
        dw2 = (out_o - label) * sigmoid_backward(out_o) @ out_h.T
        
        # (out_o - label) * sigmoid_backward(out_o) --> dloss/net_o
        dout_h = w2.T @ ((out_o - label) * sigmoid_backward(out_o))
        
        dw1 = dout_h * sigmoid_backward(out_h) @ input.T
        
        w1 = w1 - 0.5 * dw1
        w2 = w2 - 0.5 * dw2
        print(f"loss[{i}]: {loss}")
    
    print(w1)
    

def matmul_grad():
    W = np.array([[4, 5], [7, 2]])
    X = np.array([2, 6.0]).reshape(2, 1)
    label = np.array([14, 11]).reshape(2, 1)    
    
    for i in range(100):
        Y = W @ X # 线性相乘
        Loss = 0.5 * np.sum((Y-label)**2) # 损失值 --> 标量
        # dY = Y - label # 向量
        dW = (Y-label) @ X.T # 矩阵求导公式
        W = W - 0.01*dW # 更新weight
        print(f"============= loss[{i}]: ", Loss)
        
    print(W)
    
def loss_grad(o1, o2, label):
    # loss = (o1 - 14)**2 + (o2 -11)**2 # 距离越远，值越大
    # Loss = np.sum((O - Lable)**2)
    grad = [2 * (o1 - label[0]), 2 * (o2 - label[1])]
    return np.array(grad)    
 
def matrix_grad_demo():
    """
      4x + 5y = O1
      7x + 2y = O1
      
      [[4, 5], [7, 2]] * [x, y]T = [01, 02] --> A*x = O      
      label = [14, 11] # 代表我们期望的那个值      
      loss = (o1 - 14)**2 + (o2 -11)**2 # 距离越远，值越大      
    """
    A = np.array([[4.0, 5], [7.0, 2]])
    X = np.array([2, 6.0]) # 随便给的初始值
    
    Lable = np.array([14, 11])    
    lr = 0.001

    for i in range(1000):
        O = A @ X   # 前向
        grad = A.T @ loss_grad(O[0], O[1], Lable)
        X[0] = X[0] - lr*grad[0]
        X[1] = X[1] - lr*grad[1]
        print("x[0]: {}, x[1]: {}".format(X[0], X[1]))
        Loss = np.sum((O - Lable)**2)    
        print("Loss: ", Loss)   

if __name__ == "__main__":
    # matrix_grad_demo()
    # matmul_grad()
    bp_demo()
    print("run grad_descend.py successfully !!!")
